<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We don&#39;t rely on operator== working on double values, as it returns true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for things that are clearly not equal, like 0 and 0.0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// As such, this method can be used to do an exact bit-for-bit comparison of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// two floating point values.  The version with a double operand is retained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// because it&#39;s so convenient to write isExactlyValue(2.0), but please use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it only for simple constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/constantfp/#a48823e5da12f02df3ea52fc4a6bfcd3d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/constantfp/#a48823e5da12f02df3ea52fc4a6bfcd3d">isExactlyValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;V)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;llvm::ConstantFP&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a0c4530f3c64d8c2eafac20fb87105d8a">Val</a>)-&gt;isExactlyValue(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/constantfp/#aee812bee8ccb12920656a4a84d37c70e"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/constantfp/#aee812bee8ccb12920656a4a84d37c70e">isExactlyValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Definitions have initializers, declarations don&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#a3d608c01916981808c02f0d4724f78b1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#a3d608c01916981808c02f0d4724f78b1">hasInitializer</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hasDefinitiveInitializer - Whether the global variable has an initializer,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and any other instances of the global (this can happen due to weak</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// linkage) are guaranteed to have the same initializer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Note that if you want to transform a global, you must use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hasUniqueInitializer() instead, because of the &#42;&#95;odr linkage type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @a = global SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is both definitive and unique.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @b = global weak SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is neither definitive nor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// unique.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// @c = global weak&#95;odr SomeType&#42; null - Initializer is definitive, but not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// unique.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#a3cf0190c170a420ab2cefaa249c56665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#a3cf0190c170a420ab2cefaa249c56665">hasDefinitiveInitializer</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;llvm::GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a0c4530f3c64d8c2eafac20fb87105d8a">Val</a>)-&gt;hasDefinitiveInitializer();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hasUniqueInitializer - Whether the global variable has an initializer, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// any changes made to the initializer will turn up in the final executable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#af20d98097edbb1810a0a4da41521d8c7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/globalvariable/#af20d98097edbb1810a0a4da41521d8c7">hasUniqueInitializer</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;llvm::GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value/#a0c4530f3c64d8c2eafac20fb87105d8a">Val</a>)-&gt;hasUniqueInitializer();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getInitializer - Return the initializer for this global variable.  It is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// illegal to call this method if the global is external, because we cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// tell what the value is initialized to!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
